id: Never Miss a Birthday with the Birthday Tracker for Notion | Track Dates and Plan Gifts
name: Never Miss a Birthday with the Birthday Tracker for Notion | Track Dates and Plan Gifts
description: Birthday Tracker - Notion TemplateStay organized and never forget a birthday with the Birthday Tracker for Notion. Easily track important dates, sort them by nearest ones, and keep your loved ones' ages in check. Key Features:Upcoming Birthdates: Look 30 days ahead so you won't forget.Plan Gifts: Make gift plans for each person.Share Wishlists: Share and view wishlists with your family for example.Organize Parties: Plan a New Party, Share with Others, and Keep Track.Personalized Messages: Craft
features: Upcoming Birthdates:Look 30 days ahead so you won't forget.; Plan Gifts:Make gift plans for each person.; Share Wishlists:Share and view wishlists with your family for example.; Organize Parties:Plan a New Party, Share with Others, and Keep Track.; Personalized Messages:Craft and save personalized messages for each individual's birthday.
